thread.title: Final trailer released for 'The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2'
thread.title_full: Final trailer released for 'The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2'

title: Final trailer released for 'The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2'
text:
Final trailer released for 'The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2' 2:11pm EDT - 01:22 
Lionsgate releases the final trailer of 'The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2' ahead of the film's release in late November. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
(ROUGH CUT - NO REPORTER NARRATION) STORY: Ahead of the film's release on November 20, film distributor Lionsgate has released the final trailer for 'The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2.' The trailer features a rousing speech by Katniss Everdeen (Jennifer Lawrence) against the dystopian world's President Snow (Donald Sutherland) and features the games' champion going to battle with her bow and arrow. All the familiar faces are back with the addition of a few new ones, including 'Game of Thrones'' Gwendoline Christie as Commander Lyme.  //reut.rs/1ZlWSxa
